name: SuperGoalKeeper
description:
Description

SuperGoalKeeper is a complete goalie game ready to release and mobile friendly. It’s a challenging goalie game where you have to put into test your reflexes to stop the ball.

Pack Features:

  • Mobile friendly textures.
  • .SVG files included.
  •  .PNG files included.
  • C# scripts included.
  •  Documentation included.
  •  Sound effects (sfx) & Music included.
  •  Menu, Shop, Stats, Settings, help and field scenes included.

Any feedback is appreciated.

Age rating ( Everyone )
